title: Morty and the Fancy-Pants Wedding
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 1,655 words, Level S (Grade 3), Lexile 980L, Fiction Series
description: What torture! Morty has to miss his best friend's skating party to attend his Aunt Maggie's wedding. He's also a bit annoyed that his sisters are getting all the attention because they're in the wedding. Once again, Morty's mischievious nature gets him into trouble-and this time into the wedding, too!
meta: aisle, balance, ceremony, chamois, disappointed, methodically, mock, prank, shenanigans
